<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Plague Doctor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=911)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These healers, often seen wearing distinctive masks and burning powders to defend against airborne plagues, are as much feared as they are respected. To see a plague doctor signals that disease has infested the land—and that it might have already taken hold. Despite their devoted work in curing the untouchable, they are sometimes treated with suspicion, as if they are somehow the cause of the plague.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 221</row>

[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

[Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +13, [Plague Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Healer's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), [_minor healing potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (4), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +13

**Will** +13 

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +9 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +10 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 23
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Detect Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=67), [Purify Food and Drink](/Spells.aspx?ID=241) (x2)
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258)
- **3rd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (x3), [Neutralize Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 23, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Healer's Blessing](/Spells.aspx?ID=426)

**Healing Hands**   When the plague doctor casts [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), they roll d10s instead of d8s.

**Improved Communal Healing**   When the plague doctor casts [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) targeting a single creature, the plague doctor also restores Hit Points equal to the spell's level to themself or any other creature within range of the spell.

</column>
